## Description

Sets the SRID (spatial reference system identifier) of the raster. This is metadata only â€” no pixel coordinate transformation occurs. Use SRID 0 to clear the CRS. SRID 4326 is normalized to `OGC:CRS84`.

## Examples

```sql
SELECT RS_SetSRID(RS_Example(), 3857);
```
